title: TAS Artifact Metadata (Digital Birth Certificate)
description: Schema for defining the genomic identity of a code artifact in the TAS ecosystem.

id.description: Unique identifier for this artifact version (Lineage ID).

form_id.description: Deterministic hash of the artifact's content and environment (SHA-256).

genome_id.description: Identifier of the TAS_DNA package this artifact belongs to.

lineage_id.description: Recursive hash binding this version to previous versions and parent anchors.

h_seed.description: ID of the Human Seed who authorized this artifact (e.g., public key or handle).

cert_id.description: Issuance ID proving passing the Sequencing Ceremony.

timestamp.description: UTC timestamp of the sequencing ceremony.
